name: Laserstorm: A Bullet Hell Game
description:
Laserstorm is a small Android bullet hell game in space setting. 

Features:

  • Classic top-down shoot em up gameplay.
  • A capsular hitbox. The player is more vulnerable to side attacks.
  • Three types of weapons. New weapons can be unlocked by fulfilling certain conditions.
  • Five levels with fast increasing difficulty. The first two levels are suitable for beginners, the fourth and fifth are designed for more experienced players.

Please check my game (especially if you like Ikaruga and Touhou games).
